data.system_settings: Windows 10 x64 version 1709 build 16299.125 / Steam version 1513371133 / Rivatuner 7.0.
data.client_settings: Canary 0.0.189, en-EN (Tested Games are Saints Row 3 and 4 )
data.actual_result: Is impredecible, but Discord Overlay not Showing and Steam/Rivatunner working and viceversa are the most common ones. Also both can stop working.
data.expected_result: Overlay showing without messing with the game/Rivatunner Info
data.short_description: The Discord overlay will "fight" with other overlay software, causing certain game features/utilites to stop working
data.steps_to_repro: - With MSI Afterburner or Steam installed, check if you can open the Steam Overlay or see the In Game Rivatuner info - Try to open the Discord Overlay
